title: Quask Form Artist Professional
description:
Release Description:
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â±  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

   Quask FormArtist will appeal to anyone who wants to fully integrate their 
   forms and surveys into their own web pages. With Quask FormArtist, web 
   designers can create forms, which look great and are fun to fill in. 
   Forms can be embedded into websites, directly into e-mails or pop-up in 
   their own windows. Instead of hours of cumbersome design work, achieve 
   the same result in minutes. 

   With Quask FormArtist, you can easily create forms, which look great and 
   are fun to fill in. Forms can be embedded into websites, directly into 
   e-mails or pop-up in their own windows. Instead of hours of cumbersome 
   design work, achieve the same result in minutes. It covers the entire 
   survey process from form design, distribution, data collection through 
   to the analysis of your data. Quask uses unique Interactive Images 
   (Emoticons) in addition to the available standard survey tools. You are 
   in full control of the entire process.

FormArtist Professional ($899) software provides you with an advanced electronic forms and survey solution. If you require unbranded forms, offline as well as online form filling, the ability to produce advanced exports such as SPSS and HTML, or support for CRM software and ODBC datasources, you need to look at the Professional edition.  


All the features of the Standard edition. 
No Quask branding. 
PDF form creation. 
Offline as well as online form completion. 
Support for CRM software such as ACT!, GoldMine and Microsoft CRM. 
ODBC support. 
Advanced Scripting such as page and response randomization. 
SPSS, ODBC, Snap and Triple-S exports. 
Create reports in HTML. 
Automated data retrieval. 
The ability to program JavaScripts in your forms and interact with HTML or JavaScript elements on your web page. 
Automatic issue of follow-up reminders to non-respondents. 
Spell Checker.
